page.title: 11Livestock Market-Shrewsbury
page.content: The market at Shrewsbury was opened in April 1959, it is situated on the Whitchurch Road(A49), about two miles north of the Town Centre.There is ample car parking space for well over thousand cars.Vehicles for the transport of livestock are catered for with a park for two hundred lorries or more. As well as being one of the countries largest and most modern livestock markets, the Smithfield offers a wide range of extra facilities including Trade Stands, restaurant and bars, reception and banking and even a helicopter landing pad. At the entrance there is the 'Shropshire Lad' which contains a bar and restaurant as well as a coffee bar.
